cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4914, Havana Syndrome Attacks Response Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 138 (Tuesday, August 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McCAUL:
H.R. 4914.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States
[Page H4313]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: Havana Syndrome Attacks Response Act
